rxf.server

Interface CouchService<E>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - the entity this service is concerned with.

    public interface CouchService<E>
    Declares a generated service that can be implemented automatically by CouchServiceFactory. Specific to a single entity backed by CouchDB, E. Comes with two built-in methods: to find an object by key, and to persist a given object.

    The views will all be created in a design document in the specific database for E.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  CouchService.CouchRequestParam
      Indicates that the decorated annotation is a couch request param.
      static interface  CouchService.Key
      Marks a service call parameter as being used on a couchdb view GET request as "key".
      static interface  CouchService.Keys
      Marks a service method or parameter as being used on a couchdb view GET request as "keys".
      static interface  CouchService.Limit
      Marks a service method or parameter as being used on a couchdb view GET request as "limit".
      static interface  CouchService.Skip
      Marks a service method or parameter as being used on a couchdb view GET request as "skip".
      static interface  CouchService.View
      Describes the JavaScript view to run in CouchDB when this method is invoked.
